ABOUT.

Web Developer | Conservationist

I am a web developer with a passion for building user-friendly and interactive websites, using different tools and languages such as CSS, JavaScript, Python, and Bootstrap. I believe in keeping up with the times, which means keeping up to date with changing styles, demands and best practices. I am actively learning React and Adobe Experience Manager, and am excited to learn about component best practices through the style system.
